title: Create E2E test for full FO-09 flow
description:
Create e2e/fo-09.test.ts - comprehensive E2E test for the full FO-09 onboarding flow.

Base on e2e/fo-08.test.ts and adapt for FO-09 changes. The test should verify:

## Test Sections

1. **Welcome phase:** Navigate to /fo-09, complete welcome -> name -> personalized welcome -> familiarity -> topics
2. **Discovery screen 1 (sentences):** Verify complete sentences are displayed (no "..." endings), click a sentence, verify it appends to text area as-is, click Next
3. **Heart animation:** Verify heart animation appears between discovery screens
4. **Discovery screens 2+ (fragments):** Verify hybrid fragments with "..." endings, click a fragment, verify "..." is removed and text appended, click Next
5. **No reflective statement:** Verify no reflective statement text appears on discovery screens
6. **No discovery progress bar:** Verify no progress bar during discovery phase
7. **Affirmation card review:** Verify 5 cards presented one at a time, progress bar with "X/5" counter visible, click "Love it" on some and "Discard" on others
8. **Summary screen:** Verify loved affirmations listed, "I am good with these" and "I want to create more" buttons visible
9. **"I am good" flow:** Click "I am good with these", verify proceeds to background -> notifications -> paywall -> completion
10. **Completion:** Verify loved affirmations shown on completion screen

Use existing E2E patterns: Playwright, headless chromium, e2e_test_mode cookie, helper functions (clickButton, waitForText, sleep).

Key test helpers to create:
- countSentences(): count items without "..." (for screen 1)
- countFragments(): count items with "..." (for screens 2+)
- clickSentence()/clickFragment(): click input helpers
- clickLoveIt()/clickDiscard(): card review actions
- getProgressText(): read "X/5" counter

Files to create:
- e2e/fo-09.test.ts

Reference:
- e2e/fo-08.test.ts (base test, ~900 lines)
- docs/current/e2e-testing.md
- Spec: Testing Strategy section

Do not close until acceptance criteria pass.
acceptance_criteria: File e2e/fo-09.test.ts exists AND contains test for sentences (screen 1) AND contains test for fragments (screen 2+) AND contains Love it button test AND contains progress bar test
